body.name: Vantrue E1 Lite 1080P WiFi Mini Dash Cam with GPS and Speed, Free APP, Voice Control Detachable Dash Camera, 24 Hours Parking Mode, Night Vision, Motion Detection, Loop Recording, Support 512GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 33 mins

features: 1080P + HDR Dash Cam: Vantrue E1 Lite mini dash cam records in 1080P+ HDR (High Dynamic Range) Technology with a 160 degree viewing angle, thanks to the F1.8 wide aperture and decent low-light performance, you’ll be able to read number plates or find spot minor things while you were driving at night. Mini and compact design avoids obstructing the driving view and make driving safer, perfect mini dash camera for cars, truck, suv, pickup, etc.

Built in 2.4G WiFi & Free APP: This 1080P dash camera comes with Free APP(No Subscription) for Android or iOS smartphones to get a live stream, download videos, track gps data, change settings, edit and share your footage simple. Videos can be shared to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, or the social media platform of your choice with the tap of a finger, allowing you to share bits and pieces of any journey with all of your friends.

Dash Cam with GPS and Speed Tracking: Built in GPS allows the vehicle dashboard cam to record your speed in KMH or MPH, location, route and direction of travel, and the GPS data can be easily tracked via smartphone APP or PC, which could be used as extra evidence in an insurance case.

Hands Free Voice Control: Voice control function (only available in English, Japanese, Russian and Chinese) lets you control your dashboard camera with spoken commands. With your hands on wheel, you can speak commands to save video, take photo, start video, turn on/off audio, turn on /off WiFi, turn on/off screen. Everything is easier and more convenient.

24 Hours Parking Mode: This dashcam will auto switch to parking mode while your car is parked. Collision detection or buffered motion sensor can be triggered by impact or movement, low bitrate or low frame rate mode keeps recording continuously with low power consumption. Which protects your vehicle from hit and runs and theft attempts, with emergency videos saved to a separate locked folder for the ultimate peace of mind.

Credible Car Accident Attorneys: G-sensor automatically sense impact/collisions and save the emergency videos to a separate event folder so that you can view afterward. Seamless Loop recording function auto overwrite the oldest file ensuring that your camera continues to record, even if the SD card becomes full. Housing up to 512GB external memory card(Need to buy separately, recommend vantrue sd card)

18 Months Warranty: 1.54 inch LCD Screen – Easy access to live footage and settings, advanced type c usb port enables charging and transferring data conveniently, magnetic mount allowing you to detach the camera from the mount easily without having to mess with the cable, small enough to hide behind your rear view mirror, built in super capacitor to survive extreme weather, 18 months extended warranty.

1080P+HDR(High Dynamic Range) With the 1080P+ HDR Technology, this mini dash camera will automatically balance exposure in low-light or high-contrast environments, thanks to the 160 degree viewing angle and F1.8 wide aperture, you’ll be able to read number plates or find spot minor things. Smart Voice Control Allowing you to take photos, mute/unmute the microphone, start/end recording, and lock video with hands-free.

CPL Filter (Buy Separately) Effectively reduce reflections, enhance contrast and boost saturation while retaining neutral color rendition in all your shots. Rotate Display( Buy sticky gel pad separately) This dash cam also comes with rotate display function which can flip the video image 180 degrees when the camera is mounted on the dashboard upside-down, providing another solution without breaking the law for states which are illegal to mount on the windshield.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great things can come in small packages!
reviews.reviewText: Coming from an older Viofo A119 v2, I am most impressed with the size and build quality of the Vantrue E1. They have somehow packed a fantastic, feature-rich dash cam into a tiny, unobtrusive cube. It has some weight to it, and is not built with flimsy plastic. Video quality is super sharp during the day, and very impressive low light recording at night. Still haven't played with all the different resolution settings and HDR, but there are plenty options to choose from when I get around to it. Audio recording was ok but was picking up lots of of ambient cabin noise, but passable. The app works well for controlling the E1's settings, and transferring recordings to the phone. It was very easy to pair the camera to the app. Live View stutters a bit as it appears to be streaming at a lower fps, but not a big issue for me. Haven't used the included remote control, as the built-in voice control does the trick.What I really like is the magnetic GPS windshield mount. It holds the camera quite well, and makes it easy to remove the camera when needed. This was a weak point with the A119, the contacts would eventually become loose, and the power would randomly cut out until i re-seated it. With this E1 magnetic mount, it feels so much more solidly attached, and doesn't seem to mind some bumpy driving.All in all the E1 is a small yet very capable full featured dash cam, that gives lots of bang for the buck. Well packaged with everything you'll need to get it set up, and it's a Vantrue, a well respected name in the industry. Very happy so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dash cam at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small dash cam that was not too obvious so this camera fit the bill. The features are impressive and the image and function is very good. I use the voice commands and also like the remote. control. It takes a little while to figure out all the features and download procedures but once you learn it is very easy to use. I also purchased the LATEST 3 wire hard-wire kit from Vantrue. It has minimum voltage control as well as the timer control. I set it at 11.9 volt cut off and 3 hours of parking. Both have been tested and work as designed. I did not use the static attachment sheet and just used the adhesive tape square directly on the windshield. It sits behind the rear view mirror so does not obstruct anything. I'm an electronics person so the installation was very easy and straightforward . The instructions don't mention the need to find the "hot" input to the fuse and to orient the fuse tap correctly so both the original and new fuse provide proper fusing of the two circuits . I think that if you are not knowledgeable in electronics and do not have a DVM voltmeter or similar voltage. tester you should have someone that has this knowledge. I like it a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great features, Great value
reviews.reviewText: This camera has many great features such as small size, magnetic mounting for easy removal, vast programmable features, easy to operate, easy to install, very affordable price, WiFi connection to smartphone, and much more. The photos show the camera installed on the windshield, and the remote control on on dashboard. The WiFi feature comes in very handy to change camera settings, downloads, and general camera controls. Very easy to remove camera from its magnetic mount and bring it to your computer for download or settings. Windshield mounting is to first mount the supplied plastic sheet to your windshield and then attach the camera to the plastic sheet, for easy removal in the future. Surprisingly great camera for such a low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I've owned this dash camera for 18 months, using it in two different cars. I’ve been extremely satisfied with this dash cam. I love the small size and the way it attaches magnetically. So easy to attach and remove. I took my car to the dealer for servicing the other day and the service advisor said they don’t allow dash cams to be on in the service area. I just reached up and pulled mine off so easily. The service advisor asked me what brand it was because he’d never seen one so easily removed. The clarity of the recordings is excellent. I like the ability to connect it to my cell phone and the Vantrue program for Windows is excellent. Using that program displays not only your video but your speed and location on a map. I do not have the dash cam hard-wired. I've found no negatives regarding this dash cam. I’m so glad I purchased this brand and model.
